com.github.dandelion.core.html

Interface HtmlTag

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractHtmlTag, HtmlLink, HtmlScript

    public interface HtmlTag

    Super interface for all HTML tags.

    Since:
    1.1.1
    Author:
    Thibault Duchateau
